products.title: Vapour Oyster Vertical Blind

products.title: Aria Vapour 89mm Vertical Blind
products.description: Their aria range comes in many different colours and has a perfect pattern which gives it more a sophisticated look to any room they are fitted in. This grey vertical blind is the perfect match for any room to add a cool and stylish feel. Product id: sdb-vtb0926 fabric colour: vapour material: 100% polyester headrail: white slimline headrail supported by white steel brackets - top or face fixable slat width: 89mm control type: smooth chain operation with cord tilt or wand tilt and pull energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - effective thermal retention light filtering: yes aria vapour 89mm vertical blind in grey.

products.title: Vitra Vapour Vertical Blind
products.description: A blackout fabric which provides a block of colour. Available in other colours. Vitra vapour vertical blind available from leading blinds supplier kingston blinds direct. Order a free sample and get an instant price online.

products.title: Aria Vapour Vertical Blind
products.description: Intertwining wavy line design created by a two tone effect from matt and sheen threads. Aria vapour vertical blind available from leading blinds supplier kingston blinds direct. Order a free sample and get an instant price online.

products.title: Occa Vapour
products.description: Min width: 250mm max width: 4115mm min drop: 100mm max drop: 2913mm fabric composition: rigid pvc louvre width: 89mm guarantee: 12 months fittings: included controls: cord control to open/close and beaded chrome chain to tilt louvres, or wand control to open/close and twist wand to tilt louvres. Stack: a choice of left, right or split. Louvres: rigid vertical blinds are not supplied with bottom weights or stabilising chain nor are they required.
